name: EcoSim (DavidH18)
description:
Place animals and see how the population changes over time.

Creatures

Each creature starts out as a child, exploring the world and looking for food. Once grown up they also start looking for a mate.

If a creature runs out of hunger or gets eaten, it dies.

How to play

Simply choose the creature and its gender from the list, placing it on the ground your mouse(the black rectangle). As well determine the number of plants which appear

Move the camera with the WASD or Arrow Keys

To edit/ run the simulation use the P key

With the simulation paused and hovering over a creature(rectangle red)

  • Left-Click: Give the creature full hunger
  • Right-Click: Kill the creature

*Made for the AI and Games jam, however the theme wasn't really used
